haracteristic features of ocular albinism. Because females have two copies of the X chromosome, women with only one copy of a GPR143 mutation in each cell usually do not experience vision loss or other significant eye abnormalities. They may have mild changes in retinal pigmentation that can be detected during an eye examination.",GHR,ocular albinism
What are the treatments for ocular albinism ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of ocular albinism:  - Gene Review: Gene Review:
